
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<ctype.h>
#define MAX 100001
int main() {
	int T;
	char speech[MAX];
	scanf("%d\n",&T);
	while (T--) {
		
		gets(speech);
		int characters[26] = { 0 };
		int max = 0, maxp = 25;
		for (int i = 0; speech[i] != '\0'; i++) {
			char ch = tolower(speech[i]);
			int position = ch - 'a';
			if (position >= 0 && position < 26) {
				characters[position]++;
			}
		}
		for (int i = 25; i >= 0; --i) {
			if (max < characters[i]) {
				maxp = i;
				max = characters[i];
			}
		}
		std::cout << (char)('a' + maxp) << std::endl;;
	}
	return 0;
}
